html:
{%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%}

PURCHASE ORDER

{%- if doc.items[0].cost_center -%} {{ doc.items[0].cost_center }} {%- endif -%}
The following purchase order number should appear in all related correspondences:
{{ doc.name }}, PO date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.transaction_date) }}, Delivery date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.schedule_date) }}
To:

Ms. {{ doc.supplier_name }}

{{ frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier_name, "location") }}

{%- if frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier_name, "telephone_and_fax") -%}

{{ frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier_name, "attention_person") }}

{{ frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier_name, "email_address") }}

Tel/Fax: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier_name, "telephone_and_fax") }}

{%- endif -%}
{%- if doc.deliver_to -%}
Ship To:
{{ frappe.db.get_value("Branch", doc.deliver_to, "address") }}
{%- endif -%}

Dear Sir/Madam,


{%- if doc.header -%} {{ doc.header }} {%- endif -%}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.freight_and_insurance_charges -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.tax -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.other_charges -%} {%- endif -%}
Sl.No Item Code Name Unit Qty Rate (Nu) Amount (Nu)
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }} {{ row.item_name}}
{{row.description}} {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Item Group", row.item_group, "show_subgroup_in_print") -%} {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Item", {"name": row.item_code}, "item_sub_group") -%}
({{frappe.db.get_value("Item", {"name": row.item_code}, "item_sub_group")}}) {%- endif -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if row.brand_name -%}
{{ row.brand_name }} {%- endif -%} {%- if row.model_name -%}
{{ row.model_name }} {%- endif -%} {%- if row.notes -%}
({{ row.notes }}) {%- endif -%} 		{{ row.uom }} {{ row.qty }} {{ row.rate}} {{ row.amount }}
Discount {{ frappe.format_value(doc.discount * -1, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Freight and Insurance Charges {{ frappe.format_value(doc.freight_and_insurance_charges, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Taxes {{ frappe.format_value(doc.tax, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Other Charges {{ frappe.format_value(doc.other_charges, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Total {{ frappe.format_value(doc.grand_total, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Description: {{ doc.description}}
In Words: {{ (frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.grand_total))}}
{%- if doc.terms -%}

Purchase Terms & Conditions:

{{ doc.terms }} {%- endif -%}

{%- if doc.footer -%} {{ doc.footer }} {%- endif -%}

{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}
